verbs.description: [ARGM-ADJ: s'more] [V: cheesecake] this luscious dessert is just as wonderfully tasty as the campfire snack that inspired it it a great way to savor a summer classic anytime of year our 4-year - old daughter likes it so much that she requested it for her next birthday —robin andrews cary north carolina cheesecake
